profile:
The Home Improvement People have completed literally thousands of renovations since our inception. We are a unique award winning contracting company, consulted by various media as industry experts. 
Please view our website at homeimprovementpeople.com to view images of some of our projects. 
For our clients' convenience, we've implemented progress billing as well as financing.
Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship.
 
Our projects range from remodelled bathrooms and kitchens, to rear additions,  hardwood flooring, basements, second story additions and other extensive renovations. We undertake work in all budget ranges.
 
Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation. From plans and permits, to last little finishing details, The Home Improvement People is committed to completing your renovations and home improvements in a professional manner and to your complete satisfaction.
We take pride in our personalized service and our high quality workmanship. 
Call us for quality, insured work - completed on time, and on budget.
416-782-7605.

profile:
We have been providing our construction services for almost 15 years helping our clients to renovate and enhance their living space. Novacon Construction Inc are a full DESIGN-BUILD firm focusing on large scale higher end Major renovations, Home additions and full Custom Homes. We are a very well planned company that work well with clients that are looking for a high end/professional building experience and not a jack of all trades approach. Our clients work with a professional DESIGN-BUILD team that consists of in house designer, Project manager, Site supervisor and tradesman for the duration of their build.
 
Our aim is to produce a high quality product, to perform in the most efficient way possible, and to make your renovation a positive and rewarding experience. All our trades people are highly skilled and bring with them a wealth of experience. NOVACON Custom Builders & Renovators are equipped to work on any area of your home, from major additions, basements, to bathrooms, including kitchen development and we can even build your dream home!
 
A satisfied customer is our best advertisement!!!.

profile:
K H Davis Engineering Consultants Ltd are Toronto based Structural Engineers and Home Designers specializing in Houses - Watch for us on HGTV Income Property, Leave it to Bryan, Disaster DIY.  We provide structural engineering services to homeowners, architects and builders.  KH Davis Engineering Consultants Ltd prepares building permit plans for renovation and additions to all types of houses, removing bearing walls, basement lowering, fixing problems in older homes, expert witness testimony and advocacy for homeowners dealing with construction problems.  Members of Professional Engineers of Ontario and BILD.
Structural Related Construction Services also offered through our sister company K H Davis Construction Ltd. If you need a structural engineer, please contact us today!
service_area: Greater Toronto Area primarily, but we also service clients regularly as far to the west at Kitchener Waterloo/Hamilton and as far to the east as Oshawa/Ajax, and North into the Orillia/Muskoka region.
products:
Design, Permit Plans, and Construction Services for:
- Removing Load Bearing Walls
- Basement Underpinning (lowering) Design
- Secondary dwelling units
- General Structural Engineering for all types of houses and small buildings
- Architectural design for additions, renovations, and new houses
- Structural Engineering for any type of building project - residential, commercial, industrial, institutional - but we generally don't do structural engineering for very large buildings and condominium projects - we specialize in small projects which involve some sort of structural changes to a building or a building addition.  We design many new homes each year for architects and builders.
services:
- Structural Engineering Design
- Full Building Permit plans for Part 9 Buildings - Generally having 3 stories or less, and a total square footage of less than about 1800 sq. m. ( 18,000 square feet )
- Site Visits to consult on structural problems with houses - sloping floors, cracked walls, foundation settlement problems.
- Advocacy for Homeowners who have run into problems with a construction project.
brands: Joists, Beams, LVL, Basement Apartments (Secondary Dwellings)
specialities: Our Construction group specializes in the structural aspect of house construction - this includes removing load-bearing walls and installing wood and steel beams, shear frames, underpinning basements to provide for increased headroom, stabilizing houses which have settlement problems, re-structuring homes which were not correctly designed to ensure proper structural integrity, etc.
licenses: C. of A. from Professional Engineers of Ontario, Toronto Renovators License
project_rate: Varies depending upon scope of work and travel distances
project_minimum: Varies depending upon the scope of work and travel distances

profile:
House Calls is a multi year award winner on HomeStars for good reasons.  
We pride ourselves in working closely with you and your family at all stages, including space planning, design and permitting. 
Please check out our new website too.

We help smoothly navigate the complexities of construction, while helping avoid many of the costly pitfalls that lurk in the renovation minefield.  
With years of experience and hundreds of successfully completed projects, House Calls Renovation will expertly guide you through the many challenges of your project.

If you are already involved in a difficult situation with your non-performing contractor, House Calls can help here too.  
In disputes, we have acted as Mediator for home owners, and where necessary, represented them in Court as an expert witness.

House Calls offers 1) many years of professional construction industry experience, 2) one of the highest client ratings on Home Stars, 3) several "Best Of" annual awards, 4) the successful completion of hundreds of residential projects of all types and sizes, 5) the ability to provide practical, 6) cost effective design solutions with your budget in mind, building permit drawings and permit applications to the City, and project management services during construction.

For more information, please connect with us at www.jay.charendoff@sympatico.ca  OR call: Jay Charendoff Office: 416-638-4782  Cell: 647-889-4357
services: Excellence in space planning, design, and project management to achieve both an enjoyable and high quality renovation experience.
specialities: Space planning, design, cost assessment, budgeting, contractor due diligence and selection, construction contract review, contract administration, quality monitoring, project management.
diplomas: B. Architecture, UBC; B. Science, York University;LEED Accredited Professional
memberships: LEED AP, Canadian Green Building Council, 2008

Hani.Design is a full-service interior design by HANI aHANI. Hani got her master of Architecture in 2002 , she got Honour and present's  Award during her graduation for Bachelor of Interior design from Yorkville university. She is Intern Member of ARIDO, also got Gary Hewson Memorial Award from ARIDO(Associate of Interior design of Ontario. 


Since 2016, HANI.Design has approached interior design with a completely client-focused approach. We are a boutique design firm specializing in mid-high end Design. We work in both commercial and residential Interior Design.  From simple home Interior projects to complete renovations and brand new homes, office design, in homes, condominiums, office spaces. We are dedicated to making clients happy and satisfied by listening to their needs and collaborate with their ideas to offer multiples solutions for your design problems.

profile:
The home is - for most of us - the single most important investment and asset that we will own in our lifetimes.  Period.
It's where we live, where we raise our families, and it's where we build our wealth.  At McLaren Custom Homes we understand this.  Your home and -  more importantly - your plans for it, are important to us.  But let's face it, re-models can be overwhelming!!  Its hard to know where to start, who to talk to, who to trust!  Let us help make things EASY for you.  McLaren Custom Homes main goal is to make the whole renovation process an enjoyable experience.  We treat your home and project as if it were our own, because if it was our home we would want the best.   

  Our diverse team specializes in the following:
- Project Design
- Building Permit Application Packages
- New Building and Additions
- Full or Partial Renovations
- Kitchen Re-models
- Exterior Spaces
- General contracting

All of us at McLaren Custom Homes strive to deliver high-quality, cost-effective projects on schedule by employing and supporting motivated, flexible, and focused teams. We are able to orchestrate your project from start to finish using our extended crew of trustworthy and professional trades while staying on time and on budget.  We value the importance of our relationships and will continue to remain fair and true in our dealings with all employees, clients, vendors, and partners. Our clients count on our dependability, our drive, and our integrity we take so much pride in our projects end results.    
 
We cannot wait to hear from you!  Please give us a call to see if McLaren Custom Homes would be good fit for your next renovation project.
services:

- Exterior Spaces

- Custom Cabinetry
- Decks and Fences
- Drywall
- Staircases

profile:
We are a professional engineering team (Architectural, Structural, Mechanical), ready to provide or help you with your building permit package.

Our Expert Services:
For residential:
• Basement Apartment including walk-out entrance.
• Interior Alteration (structural walls change to beams, add a door or window)
• Attached / Detached Garage, Decking, Sunroom and Swimming Pool etc.
• Brand new house or addition. 
• Laneway Suite Permits

For commercial:
Office, Restaurant, Barber Shop, Tea House, Badminton pool, Dentist etc.

Why us:
• Best service of GTA including before and after permit approval!
• Free Consultation!
• All approved and designed by PEO registered Professional Engineers Ontario and British Columbia.
• Any comments received from the city will be addressed with no additional charges.

How we operate:
• Send us a message with your job description and property municipality.
• Receive Quote and book site visit date.
• We arrive to take measurements and site discussion.
• Our design team work on design to ensure the client’s goals are achieved.
• We provide the permit package or apply it on your behalf.

How to contact us:
• Call or Text: (647)-889-9007
• Email: weconsultingcan@gmail.com
services: Residential and commercial designs for building permits.
name: W.E Consulting & Construction LTD

profile:
Founded in 2009, TC Homes is a Luxury Custom Home Builder specializing in development amongst the most prominent areas within the Greater Toronto Area and the GTA.

TC Homes is proud to work with the highly experienced architects and designers of this industry.

TC Homes has two main purposes: to bring quality and safety to life and to exceed customers’ expectations by building every element to perfection.

TC Homes Contracting has provided diverse services for clients and architects throughout the GTA region for more than 20 years. As a full service contractor, we have the skills and experience to manage, build and support a wide variety of project types and client needs; we strive to provide excellent services …
service_area: We serve all of GTA including, Toronto, Markham, NorthYork, Richmondhill, Mississauga, Scarborough, Vaughn, Brampton, Woodbidge, Whitby...
services:
At any scale, TC Homes presents each client with superior service and attention throughout the project. 

Services include:

new construction 
renovation/tenant improvements 
project management 
construction management 
bobcat excavation
estimating and scheduling 
in-house services 
renovations 
From beginning to end, effective construction management is essential to any project. The Project Manager coordinates all aspects of the project and is the primary contact for all needs and concerns for the duration of the project. TC Homes has a commitment to the project and team and employs pre-construction value engineering, savings through negotiated projects, and project-specific construction strategy, while presenting and maintaining the construction schedule with expert project coordination.
The In-House Service Division provides TC Homes clients with continued service after construction is complete. This includes:

facilities management 
monthly or yearly inspections 
cost analysis for budgets 
hourly rates for in-house work 
third party negotiations for other services 
24-hour emergency service 
commercial painting 
exotic coatings 
occupied painting
name: TC Homes

profile:
We are an Engineering, Architectural and Municipal Planning services firm based in Greater Toronto Area. Working closely with developers, builders and home owners in conjunction with municipalities and regions across the GTA  for years achieving our clients goals to produce quality design and plans and obtain building permits and approvals covering major and minor buildings and site plan requirements including but not limited to: 

Design permit drawings and approvals for new builds 

Extension, modifications, basement entrance, wall removal, deck, etc. permit drawings and approvals

Site Plan approvals

Civil drawings including site servicing, grading, erosion & sediment control plan, etc.

Blueprint 360 exemplifies the new generation with up-to-date designs, technology, and customer care.

profile:
Mark's General Renovations is an experienced, full service, home renovation company, who you can depend on. We've built a solid reputation for outstanding home renovations that blend seamlessly with our customers' surroundings.

Whether you're looking to do a kitchen remodel or a home addition, MGR can help you to evaluate which changes and upgrades are right for you - while keeping your budget in mind. We'll also help with design ideas, and color consultation. We take special pride in the responsiveness and innovation of our home renovations, as well as the high quality of materials, products, craftsmanship and personal service we provide our clients.


Perhaps you need to turn a spare room into a cozy personal space, or remodel a bathroom or a Finished Basement. Maybe you require a Home Addition, or remodeling of your entire home. We can turn the house you have into the home you want; a home designed and remodeled to make you happy.


We work with home owners in Etobicoke, Mississauga, Oakville, and Burlington. We stand behind our work, warranty every job, and go to great lengths to ensure that our clients are involved in the design process - every step of the way. Our commitment to you, our customer, is to do the very best job, on time, on budget - guaranteed.


For many of our homeowners; we are pleased to be their "contractor for life." We look forward to the opportunity of earning your trust, and your business.
products: Basement Renovation, Kitchens, Additions, Bathrooms, Flooring, Exterior
services: Build, Design, Project Management
specialities: A great smile. We'll bring the coffee!

profile:
QUALITY IS A WAY OF LIFE:

Inputting over 20 years of experience into the field of construction, Artycon has become recognized as one of the leading Custom Construction Firm. Innovative techniques, customized planning, and impeccable service have allowed us to skyrocket to success and maintain a strong and loyal clientele.We have the passion for creating and building your dream project. We care about maximum efficiency and love to see satisfied client. 

Our Strategy: 

Providing authentic and mindful construction plan along with 100% customized design for each client has been and always will be the number one priority for Artycon Custom Construction . A commitment to extensive documentation and archiving of past projects, along with progressive sourcing and implementation allows us to be exceptional in providing client with top of the experience.

Why Choose US: 

We Love What We Do-
We have the passion for creating and building your dream project. We care about maximum efficiency and love to see satisfied client.

We Truly Care-
The right care can ensure the success of any projects. We believe in partnership & trust and work with you to create a great space. 

Our Promise to You-
We have an unwavering philosophy of caring for our project and our customer's perspectives in order to accomplish the best quality project to grantee your satisfaction. 

Trust-
Our relationship with our clients, professional partners, and subcontractors has transparency. With complete honesty from the start, there is a neutral base to work from. Our foundation is to build a trusting relationship, leading to many successful endeavors together.  

Our Team-

Over the years, we have built solid relationships within the construction industry and our team are highly competent to provide professional services to our customer and clients in the industry from architects, interior designers to specialized trades like Concrete worker, Carpenter, Dry-Waller, Taper/Plasterer, Electricians, Plumbers, HVAC, Painter, Landscapers etc. We are confident these working relationships have helped us to provide our customers with the best quality services for your projects.

We are fully insured and we make sure to use the right procedures to protect you and your property. 

Additionally, we strive to maintain a clean job site and will take necessary steps to keep disruptions to you and your home to a minimum. 

Call us today, and see what our commitment to quality is all about! We may not be related, but you’ll feel like we’re family. 

http://www.artycons.com/ 
info@artycons.com
(416)900-3563
